resources.string: Join travelers, share experiences. Your journey, their company.
Match with travelers, journey together. Connect, travel, bond.
Book rides seamlessly, travel hassle-free. Your seat, a tap away.
Chat, plan, explore as companions. New friendships, shared roads.
Please be on time as we have a tight schedule.
We will send a code to your phone to reset your password.
Please enter the verification code sent to your email address
Other relevant details about the trip
Thank you for choosing our ride-sharing platform! Your booking request for the upcoming trip has been successfully sent. We’ll notify you as soon as your booking is confirmed.
Hold your driver’s license in hand and flash your best smile for the camera. Your journey towards becoming a driver starts with this snapshot.
Your submission has been received. We will be in touch and contact you ASAP
We’ll notify you as soon as your booking is confirmed.
Your booking is approved! Please proceed with payment to confirm.
Your booking is now confirmed! Anticipate the upcoming trip day.
Trip successfully completed. Thank you for riding with us!
Trip Canceled. We\'re Sorry for the Inconvenience.
Choose the date of the trip
Set a price for the trip
Share your thoughts about the trip: Did you enjoy the ride? How was the overall experience?
You are not logged in! Please log in to get access.
Invalid token. Please log in again!
Your token has expired! Please log in again.
Restrictions on luggage type and weight

By accessing or using the Trooute mobile application ("the App"), you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing the App.

2.1. Liability for Accidents/Damage: Users, both drivers, and passengers, acknowledge and agree that they are solely responsible for any accidents, injuries, or damages that may occur during or as a result of using the App. Trooute assumes no liability for any such incidents.
2.2. Cancellation Policy: No costs will be refunded for cancellations. Users are responsible for understanding and adhering to the cancellation policy outlined in the App.
For any inquiries or communication related to the App, users may contact us at trooute@outlook.com.
Trooute reserves the right to modify these terms at any time without prior notice. By continuing to use the App after modifications, users accept the updated terms.
